General.Name: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Limited
General.Description: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Limited operates as a non-banking financial institution-investment and credit company in India. It invests in listed and unlisted equities. The company was incorporated in 1945 and is based in Pune, India.
